Snippet.Name: IndexCreateFullSyntax
Snippet.Text: CREATE UNIQUE CLUSTERED INDEX /*index_name*/ ON /*database_name*/./*owner*/./*table_or_view_name*/ (/*column_1*/ DESC, /*column_2*/) WITH PAD_INDEX, FILLFACTOR = /*fillfactor_value*/, IGNORE_DUP_KEY, DROP_EXISTING, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE ON /*name_of_filegroup*/ GO
